bug.author: JTrantow
bug.summary: Image::Prepare() not refactored in RealSense CPP example.
bug.description:
Describe the bug geometry::Image::PrepareImage() was refactored to geometry::Image::Prepare() but this change did NOT propogate to the RealSense project. To Reproduce
Install Open3D Build from Source CMake option BUILD_LIBREALSENSE checked. Configure to build VisualStudio .sln. ALL_BUILD solution or just build examples/CPP/RealSense project.
Expected behavior Assume examples will build without errors.
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/932525/67806863-bbbce000-fa61-11e9-8a07-d22be1fe9c6c.png></denchmark-link>
Environment (please complete the following information):
OS: Windows 10.0 Python version: NA Open3D version: 0.8.0.0 CMake 3.13.1 Is this remote workstation?: no How did you install Open3D?: build_from_source
